rows.label: qst200416_msg0001
rows.name:
Say, Punin-san. Is it true
that you're involved with
the Bloody Lobster?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0002
rows.name:
That is misunderstanding,
mo! Punin is the one whose
life is being targeted, mo!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0003
rows.name: ...What do you mean?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0004
rows.name:
There is a plan to eliminate
me so I cannot speak of ex-Chairman
Bahn's wrongdoings, mo.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0005
rows.name:
For that purpose, the Bloody
Lobster has been hired and they
are targeting Punin's life, mo!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0006
rows.name:
I see. So you're not the
one who hired them, you're
their next target...

rows.label: qst200416_msg0007
rows.name:
That is correct, mo! At
this rate, Punin cannot
even sleep peacefully, mo!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0008
rows.name:
Could it be that you all are
pursuing the Bloody Lobster, mo?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0009
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0010
rows.name:
Then Punin wants you
to protect him, mo!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0011
rows.name:
They will surely come to attack Punin,
so you can catch them then, mo!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0012
rows.name: ...You would offer yourself as bait?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0013
rows.name:
I think it's a good idea, but
isn't it quite dangerous?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0014
rows.name:
However, with me here, there
should be no issue...

rows.label: qst200416_msg0015
rows.name:
Is that not why the Drivers
are also cooperating?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0016
rows.name:
Vasara's right. If we all work
together and protect him
carefully, it will be alright!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0017
rows.name:
My life is being targeted
anyway, mo. Being a decoy
is a piece of cake, mo!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0018
rows.name: Alright, let's go with that plan.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0019
rows.name:
The Bloody Lobster will probably
attack late at night, mo.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0020
rows.name:
Let's gather in front of
Punin's hideout on the Salvage
Deck around midnight, mo!
